thread.section_title: CDJapan評価／レビュー | お客様は CDJapanの評価／レビューをしました。 | www.cdjapan.co.jp
thread.title: Hellen Park
thread.title_full: CDJapan について 投稿者 Hellen Park

author: Hellen Park
title: Hellen Park
text: I bought the Doukyuusei fanbook and received everything within a month! I was stoked to received this book and couldn't be happier with the way CDJapan packed it nicely for me. I went with the cheapest package and everything came in good condition. Their shipping rate isn't that bad. I highly recommend this site to anyone who's interesting in souvenirs from Japan!
